name: MechWarrior [SNES]
description:
MechWarrior, known in Japan as Battletech (バトルテック), is a first-person action video game for the Super NES based on the Battletech universe. The SNES game was based upon the original PC MechWarrior, with updated graphics that utilized Mode 7 for the Battlemech mission sequences instead of the PC version's flat-shaded 3D graphics.
The game was followed by a sequel, MechWarrior 3050, which was played from an isometric view.
